publicationStmt.publisher: Uppsala University, Department of linguistics and philology

msContents.summary: Translations of Biblical texts into North-Western Karaim: The Latter Prophets, The Twelve Minor Prophets, the Sifrei Emet (Psalms, Proverbs, Job), and the Five Megillot (Song of Songs, Ruth, Lamentations, Ecclesiastes, Esther)

ab.title: Jeremiah 47
ab.l: Ki ėdi navilik śoźu H-nyn Jirmijahuɣa ol naviǵa Ṕeliš́- tim üč́uń vatmastan burun parʿo ʿAzany.

Bolej ajtty H muna suvlar keĺadirĺar cafondan da bolurlar öźańǵa tašadoɣon da taštyryrlar jerni da tolusun šaharny da olturuvčularyn anyn
da firjat ėt́arĺar ol ol adam da syjyt ėt́ar bar olturuvčusu ol jerniń.
Avazyndan orunmaɣynyn qoptalarynyn ḱuč́ĺu atlaryn qalt- ramaɣyndan markavynyn čuvundan ḱupč́akĺariniń qajyrylmaslar atalar ulan- larɣa salpramaɣyndan qollarnyn.
Ol keĺadirĺar ḱuń üč́uń talama bar ėliń Ṕeliš́timniń ėksit́ḿa Corɣa da Cidonɣa bar qaldyɣyn bolu- šuvčunun ki talar H Ṕeliš́timni qaldyɣyn otračynyn Kaftornun.
Keĺdi čyzuv ʿAzaɣa kesiĺdi Ašqelon qaldyɣy t́eŕańlikĺariniń ḫačanɣa d́ejiń julḥu- nursuz.
Hoj qylyčy H-nyn qačanɣa d́ejiń tynč almassyn ištyrylɣyn qynyja tynč alɣyn da šošlanɣyn.
Ńečik śeń tynč alyrsyn daha bujurdu anar Ašq- elon üč́uń da boɣozu üč́uń ol t́eńgiźniń anda biĺǵaĺadi any.
